trans-unit.source: I need information on installing and configuring Team Foundation Server
trans-unit.target: I need information on installing and configuring Team Foundation Server

trans-unit.source: Use integrated, powerful, cross-platform, enterprise-level Agile tools for DevOps so your team can share code, build often, test early, and ship faster.
trans-unit.target: Use integrated, powerful, cross-platform, enterprise-level Agile tools for DevOps so your team can share code, build often, test early, and ship faster.

trans-unit.source: Use this index to setup and manage your account or servers as well as configure key settings to support your teams. <ul> <li>Want to work in the cloud?
trans-unit.target: Use this index to setup and manage your account or servers as well as configure key settings to support your teams. <ul> <li>Want to work in the cloud?

trans-unit.source: Set up a Team Services account.
trans-unit.target: Set up a Team Services account.

trans-unit.source: Connect your dev tools, share code, invite team members, and start working.
trans-unit.target: Connect your dev tools, share code, invite team members, and start working.

trans-unit.source: Install on-premises TFS on your own servers.
trans-unit.target: Install on-premises TFS on your own servers.

trans-unit.source: Or upgrade TFS, if you have an earlier version.
trans-unit.target: Or upgrade TFS, if you have an earlier version.

trans-unit.source: Learn about setting up and configuring both here.
trans-unit.target: Learn about setting up and configuring both here.
